name: code-list-creator-webapp
description: A web application to support code list creation, validation, reproduction and reuse.

scripts.deploy:gh: git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy: git add --all && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push origin master && git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages

author: Richard Williams <richard.williams2@manchester.ac.uk>
